body: Finally I got K/D 2.0!!! Hell yeAh!

title: Finally !!!

replies.body:
Nice dude! Congrats!
I'm almost there myself. XD

replies.body: Haha, congratulations. Meanwhile, I'm struggling to get my own K/D above four... it usually stays around a tenth under, though it nearly surpassed my goal after I did a bit of kill farming yesterday. As long as you stay persistent, there's hope, I suppose.

replies.body: You are still too good. I'm almost close to level 50! I want prestige so badly.
